DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan nitrofurantoin monohydrate/macrocrystals capsule Procter & Gamble Macrobid® capsule follow single , oral 100 mg ( 1 x 100 mg ) dose fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fed Study Mylan Nitrofurantoin Monohydrate/Macrocrystals Capsules 100 mg Macrobid® Capsules 100 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy , adult subject , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
